1. 以linux 操作系统为基础的 android 系统</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2. 以 L4，REX为基础的 Modem 部分</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
在高通7系列的架构中，一个IC内部集成有两个ARM处理器，一个ARM9（或者arm11），专门负责处理通信协议，射频以及GPIO等，软件架构采用 AMSS， 另外一个是ARM11，用来处理多媒体，上层应用，以及其他的一些任务，运行的系统是 android 系统，这两个处理器之间通过共享内存的硬件方式来进行通信。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.2.1.1　什么是L4,REX,BREW,AMSS以及相互之间的关系</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
L4是一组计算机程序，是最初由Jochen Liedtke设计的微内核构架的操作系统内核，现在已经形成一个微内核家族。L4这个微内核系统由于其出色的性能和很小的体积而开始被计算机工业所认知，被移植到了许多不同的硬件构架上。高通的 L4 提供了操作系统最基本的操作，是买别人的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
早期的操作系统绝大多数是 Monolithic Kernel, 意思是整个操作系统 - 包括Scheduling (调度), File system (文件系统), Networking (网络), Device driver (设备驱动程序), Memory management (存储管理), Paging(存储页面管理) - 都在内核中完成.一直到现在广泛应用的操作系统,如UNIX,Linux,和Windows还大都是monolithic kernel操作系统.但随着操作系统变得越来越复杂(现代操作系统的内核有一两百万行C程序是很常见的事情),把所有这些功能都放在内核中使设计难度迅速增加.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
微内核是一个与Monolithic Kernel相反的设计理念.它的目的是使内核缩到最小,把所有可能的功能模块移出内核.理想情况下,内核中仅留下Address Space Support(地址空间支持),IPC (Inter-Process Communication,进程间通讯),和Scheduling(调度),其他功能模块做为用户进程运行。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
REX 是在 L4 之上封装的服务，是一个抢占式，多任务的RTOS，所有的任务都以task的形式存在，REX提供包括任务创建，同步，互斥，计时器，中断控制等功能的API，这里的task实际上就是我们的线程，每个 task对应着一个线程。REX维护一个task list(双向链表)，始终运行高优先级的task。products里面所有的服务包括3g协议栈等都是以task的形式跑在rex之上的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
而Brew的话是运行的环境，跟Java 有点儿类似，相当于是一个虚拟机。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
AMSS――高级的移动用户软件(Advanced Mobile Subscriber Software)技术，是一种新的软件架构，是对原来软件架构 DMSS 的升级。 AMSS源代码实际上是QC BREW(Binary Runtime Environment For Wireless)平台的的底层部分，去掉了为应用程序提供接口的AEE(application execution environment)部分，高通在Dual Proc芯片上的其他平台基本上都是采用的这样的架构。</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.2.2.3　获取 modem 源代码</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
根据硬件配置情况，选择不同的 BUILD ID, 然后根据 BUILD ID 选择相近的源代码</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
modem 代码通过有效的高通帐号登录  HYPERLINK "https://support.cdmatech.com/login/" https://support.cdmatech.com/login/ 网站获取</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
BUILD ID 是一组字母的组合，如：AAABQOLYM</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
以下分别对各个字段进行说明：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第三个字母 A 表示 LPDDR2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; #USES_LPDDR2=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第三个字母 B 表示 LPDDR1</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第六个字母 M 表示 Multimode</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第六个字母 C 表示 CDMA</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第六个字母 D 表示 JCDMA&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;#相对于C多了：USES_UMTS=yes USES_DSHDR_JCDMA_APIS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第六个字母 O 表示 UMTS only #相对于C多了：USES_UMTS=yes USES_SUPPORT_UMTS_GPS_PROTOCOLS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; #相对于C少了：USES_CDMA=yes USES_HDR=yes USES_REL_C=yes USES_CDMA2000=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;#USES_EXPORT_MCCMEID=yes USES_SUPPORT_CDMA_GPS_PROTOCOLS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第7，8个字母为 AZ&nbsp; 表示 NADN boot</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第7，8个字母为 LY&nbsp; 表示 eMMC boot &nbsp;#相对于AZ多了选项： USES_SDCC_BOOT=yes USES_HSU_MS_FD_BOOT=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
最后一个字母为 M &nbsp;&nbsp;表示&nbsp; modem</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
最后一个字母为 A &nbsp;&nbsp;表示&nbsp; app</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
以上为 7x30 平台的一些规律，具体参考文档，7227 参考相应的 release note：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&lt;&lt;80-VR192-1_E_AMSS_Linux_Software_Users_Manual.pdf&gt;&gt;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第1个字母</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第2个字母&nbsp; F: 基于ffa参考设计 S: 基于surf的参考设计</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第3个字母</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第4个字母</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第5个字母&nbsp; K /J</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
K 相对于 J 多了以下选项</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_HSU_CHG_BOOT=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_HSU_FAST_CHARGE=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_CHARGER=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_EBI1_TURBO_FFA=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第6个字母&nbsp; O/ N / P</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
O表示只支持 UMTS(WCDMA)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
------------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_IPHC=yes&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_PDCP=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_SUPPORT_UMTS_GPS_PROTOCOLS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_UMTS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
-----------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
P表示只支持 CDMA/CDMA2000</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_CDMA=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_CDMA2000=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_REL_C=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_SUPPORT_CDMA_GPS_PROTOCOLS=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_EXPORT_MCCMEID=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
USES_HDR=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
-----------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
N表示既支持 UMTS(WCDMA) 且支持 CDMA/CDMA2000</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第7个字母</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
第8个字母</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
surf和ffa的区别</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
generally speaking surf have FPGA and don't have battery.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
and FFA don't have FPGA but have battery.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
msm7627_surf and msm7627_ffa and msm7627_7x_surf means different hardware reference design. please check with your hardware engineer on which qualcomm hardware reference you use and then select the right build command.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.6 Build commands</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
To create an AMSS build, run the command script with the build ID matching the build</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
configuration desired. The command scripts may be executed from the build/ms subdirectory or</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
from the AMSS root directory using the full path to the command script as in the following</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
examples:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/&lt;asic&gt;/build/ms/MSNCJNLYM.cmd – For SURF multimode build</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/&lt;asic&gt;/build/ms/MSNCJOLYM.cmd – For SURF UMTS only build</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/&lt;asic&gt;/build/ms/MSNCJPLYM.cmd – For SURF 1X only build</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/&lt;asic&gt;/build/ms/MFNCKNLYM.cmd – For FFA multimode and for reference only</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
以高通的开发板子为例，看如何选择源代码，通过 QPST 连接高通的开发板，我们可以看到他的配置信息如下：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
高通 demo 版的配置情况：SURF-MSM7630 7X30A-AAABQMAZM-1200</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
从配置情况来看只有 HY11-N0216-3_1.2.00&nbsp; HY11-N0216-4_1.2.20 满足要求</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
HY11-N0216-3_1.2.00/AMSS/products/7x30/build/ms/AAABQMAZM.cmd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
HY11-N0216-4_1.2.20/AMSS/products/7x30/build/ms/AAABQMAZM.cmd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
后期我们要跟据实际情况来选择 BUILD ID，如我们的手机的配置情况为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
LPDDR2 ，WCDMA，eMMC 启动(NAND备选)，那么modem 的BUILD ID为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
AAABQOLYM 或者 AAABQOAZM</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
AAABQOLYM HY11-N0723-2_1.2.20/AMSS/products/7x30/build/ms/AAABQOLYM.cmd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
AAABQOAZM HY11-N1122-1_1.2.20/AMSS/products/7x30/build/ms/AAABQOAZM.cmd (NABD boot 备选)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
高通的Android第一人晓峰不建议我们第一次就用eMMC，而应该用Nand，目前只有HTC在用eMMC。高通在eMMC上面提供了参考代码，但是是未经过验证。终端厂商在使用过程中，一定会有很多问题需要自己解。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
补充信息：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
现在可能用到 BUILD ID 以及相应的 modem 和 vendor 源代码。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
modem代码：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; BUILD ID&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; modem 源代码&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; modem镜像&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;说明文档</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
M7630AABBQMAZM1200&nbsp;&nbsp; HY11-N0216-3.zip&nbsp; HK11-N0216-3.zip&nbsp; HT11-N0216-3.zip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
M7630AABBQMAZM1220&nbsp;&nbsp; HY11-N0216-4.zip&nbsp; HK11-N0216-4.zip&nbsp; HT11-N0216-4.zip</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.2.2.3.1　高通 modem 源代码编译前的修正</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
从高通获取的源代码直接编译会存在一些问题，以下为可能的问题以及解决方法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1) 为相应的脚本加上编译选项</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
vim ./AMSS/products/7x30/build/ms/xxxxxx.cmd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
加上： BUILD_UNIX=yes</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2） 如果编译过程出现 .pl 文件没有执行权限而退出，那么为工程下面所有的 pl 文件加上可执行属性，命令：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
find ./ -name "*.pl" |xargs chmod&nbsp; 755</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
3) 无法找到需要的 pl 脚本解析器</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./rvds2.2_linux-pentium/setuplinux.bin</p>

执行以上命令，按照默认步骤安装，安装路径为:~/ARM</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.2.4.1.2　Flex 简单使用指南</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
FLEXlm是应用广泛的License管理工具，它以使软件License能够在网上浮动而出名。浮动的License有利于软件的使用和对 License的管理，这使得用户能够高效地使用有效的许可，并使管理者能够控制允许使用它的节点。由于有大约1500厂商使用FLEXle管理 lICENSE,所以CAD系统管理人员极有可能要同时安装和管理来自不同厂商的License或同一厂商多个产品的License文件。可采取以下方法避免产生冲突：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (1)用一个服务器运行一个Lmgrd(License文件的后台管理程序)和多个License文件；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (2)用一个服务器运行多个Lmgrd和License文件；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (3)运用多个服务器节点，每个服务器运行单独的Lmgrd和License文件。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 第一种选择主要造用于高版本的Lmgrd，V6之前和FLEXlm，每个Lmgrd只能管理一个License文件；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 第二种选择，将使用一台服务器，但需要运行多个Lmgrd;第三种选择，必须使用多个License服务器。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 一、服务器端设定</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 1.License文件的设定</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 在使用FLEXlm进行管理的License文件中一般有SERVER行，它通过SERVER行的hostname和hostID定义License服务器。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; SERVER this_host 0050BB0F402 27000</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; hostname hostID post</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 2.服务方式的选择</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (1)一个服务器运行一个Lmgrd和多个License文件如果多个License文件具有相同的hostID,则可以通过修改hostname进行合并。合并时，首先将多个License文件加到一个文件中，然后修改SERVER行，并且只保留一个SERVER行。对于Windows NT操作系统，应在各License的默认位置保存一个合并后的备份，这样每个软件将在其默认位置找到License信息，从而避免了对 LM_LICENSE_FILE的设定；对于UNIX操作系统，可以建立一个默认位置到License存放位置和Link。合并后的License文件，就可以使用同一个Lmgrd。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (2)一个服务器运行一个Lmgrd和一个别License文件如果HostID不一样，则这些License服务只能运行于不同的服务器节点上，并且License不能合并。可以选择使用一个服务器运行一个Lmgrd和License文件。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (3)一个服务器运行多个Lmgrd和License文件如果多个License未进行合并，可以通过在同一台机器上启动多个Lmgrd,每个 Lmgrd管理一个License文件。使用多个Lmgrd管理多个License文件对服务器的性能并没有明显影响。如果License是由不同版本的 FLEXlm产生的，一般是新版本可以管理旧版本的License文件。所以应使用最新的Lmgrd和Vendor daemon。另外，当用一个服务器的多个Lmgrd管理多个License文件时，应该注意任何二个License文件的post都不能一样，并且对于每个License而言，应选用合造的Lmgrd。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 二、客户端设定</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 当使用客户端应用程序时(a Licensedapplication),可以通过在系统的环境变量中设定LM_LICENSE_FILE,使Application能够指向不同服务器上的License文件。如果要使a Licensed application使用不同服务器都有单独的一个License文件),客户端应将需要用到的License文件拷贝到本机目录下，并指定LM_LICENSE_FILE环境变量。UNIX: %setenv LM_LICENSE_FILE lfpath1 : lfpath2 :…… :
 lfpathN Windows: lfpath1 ;lfpath2:…… ;lfpathN LfpathN为第N个License的路径；UNIX下路径间用"："隔开；Windows/NT下路径间使用"；"隔开；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 这样，每个Licensed aplication在启动时将依次查询LM_LICENSE_FILE中所指定的License文件，并向相应的License服务器申请许可，以使用户能从所列的服务器得到许可。LM_LICENSE_FILE也可以使用各License文件中所指定的"post@hostname"。下面以Windows NT为例介绍多个FLEXlm的安装。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; 三、同一机器上多个FLEXlm License Server的安装</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (1) 以Administrator身分登录；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (2)在C盘建C:\FLEXlm目录，并拷贝相关文件到其下；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (3)在C:\FLEXlm下建立欲安装License Server的软件目录，放置各软件的License文件，Daemon和Daemon所需的动态连接库；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (4)修改License.dat和SERVER行和DAEMON的位置，并启动FLEXlm License Manager。&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (5)在Setup修改Service Name,输入造当名称，以区别是何种License服务；利用Browse选择合适Lmgrd.exe和对应和License.dat并指定Debug.log和放置路径；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (6)选中"StartServer at Power-Up"与"Use NT Services"，这样下次启动机器时，将自动启动该Li-cense服务；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (7)点击Control按钮检查Service Name是否与设定名称相同，如果不同，回到"Setup"重新选择Service Name;如果一样，点击"Start"启动该Li-cense Server;点击"Status"检查Licevse Server启动情况，若出现Server_name: License server UP (MASTER),表示License Server启动成功；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (8)安装另外的License Server:可依上述(3)~(7)重新执行一次即可；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (9)切换不同License Server:在"Setup"中选择适当的"Service Name"，然后启动或停止相应的License服务；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; (10)移除License Server:在"Setup"选择适当的"Service Name"，然后按"Remove"即可。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.2.4.1.3　启动 license 服务器</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
#!/bin/bash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
ac_PATH=~/ARM/Utilities/FLEXlm/9.2/release/linux-pentium/</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
PATH=${ac_PATH}:${PATH}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
export PATH</p>

1.3.1.3　boot.img 生成过程解析，怎样手动生成 boog.img</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
boot.img 包括两个部分： kernel 和 ramdisk ，通过命令：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
make&nbsp; out/target/product/msm7630_surf/boot.img showcommands</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
会自动生成 kernel 和 ramdisk，然后把两者合并制作成烧写的镜像文件：boot.img</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
kernel 为 out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/obj/KERNEL_OBJ/arch/arm/boot/zImage</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
或者 out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/kernel , kernel 是 zImage 的拷贝</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
编译内核之前必须获取一个默认的配置文件 .config ,此配置文件可以生成，或者来自默认配置，高通中 msm7630_surf 的</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
默认配置文件名为： msm7630-perf_defconfig 在文件：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
vendor/qcom/msm7630_surf/AndroidBoard.mk:45 中通过：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
KERNEL_DEFCONFIG := msm7630-perf_defconfig 进行了指定。</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
我们可以通过命令：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
make -j3 ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-eabi- kernel showcommands</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
或者通过如下命令一步步完成：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
1. 获取默认的内核配置并生成.config 的命令如下：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; make -C kernel O=../out/target/product/msm7630_surf/obj/KERNEL_OBJ ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-eabi- msm7630-perf_defconfig</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; -C kernel 告诉 make 进入 kernel 工作目录，到其下面寻找 makefile 文件</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; O&nbsp; 内核编译的中间文件以及编译结果等都存储在该目录下,此做法的好处是不会在kernel源代码目录下生成垃圾文件</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; ARCH=arm 告诉系统到 ./kernel/arch/$ARCH/configs/ 目录下找文件 msm7630-perf_defconfig，生成的.config 保存在：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; out/target/product/msm7630_surf/obj/KERNEL_OBJ/.config</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
2. 手动编译内核</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; make -C kernel O=../out/target/product/msm7630_surf/obj/KERNEL_OBJ/</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
3. 如果需要配置内核，使用下面的命令</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp; make kernelconfig</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">

<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">

<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
4. 手动生成 ramdisk 执行命令</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp; make&nbsp; out/target/product/msm7630_surf/ramdisk.img showcommands</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 会用到命令：</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp; out/host/linux-x86/bin/mkbootfs out/target/product/msm7630_surf/root | out/host/linux-x86/bin/minigzip &gt; \</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp; out/target/product/msm7630_surf/ramdisk.img</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
5. 手动生成 boot.img 需要使用命令 mkbootimg ,语法如下:</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;&nbsp; mkbootimg --kernel 内核 --ramdisk ramdisk镜像 --cmdline 命令行 --base 基地址 --pagesize 大小 --output 输出的boot.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;==========</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
KERNEL=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/kernel</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
KERNEL=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/obj/KERNEL_OBJ/arch/arm/boot/zImage</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
OUTPUT=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/boot.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
bootable/bootloader/lk/AndroidBoot.mk:3:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
out/target/product/msm7630_surf/appsboot.mbn</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

else</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

perl $(COREBSP_BUILD)/scripts/genpaths.pl -min incpaths.min -buildid $(BUILD) -makeflags "$(MAKEFLAGS)" &gt; $(COREBSP_BUILD)/data/incpaths$(BUILD_LC).py</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$(COREBSP_BUILD)/data/incpaths$(BUILD_LC).py</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
所以 scons_builder 实际执行了以下命令：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
chmod +x ./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/tools/SCons/scons</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
cd ./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/build</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/tools/SCons/scons modem CHIPSET=msm7x30 BUILD_ID=AAABQMAZ BUILD_VER=1220 MSM_ID=7x30 HAL_PLATFORM=7x30 BUILD_ASIC=7X30A TARGET_FAMILY=7630 --verbose=0 –frommake</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.3.3.5.1.1.2.1 命令 pboot_gen_elf image_header pboot_add_hash 解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
pboot_gen_elf image_header pboot_add_hash 是编译过程中用到的几个工具</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
编译过程中常用的几个工具</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
命令 ./AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/pboot_gen_elf 用法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
pboot_gen_elf [-d] elf_file scl_file output_elf output_hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
或者：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
pboot_gen_elf [-d] elf_file output_hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
-d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - debug 模式</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 格式为ELF的输入文件，它由linker生成</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
scl_file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - input progressive boot scatter load file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_elf&nbsp;&nbsp; - output ELF file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_hash&nbsp; - output hash table</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
例如：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
PBOOT_GEN_ELF=./AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/pboot_gen_elf</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_file=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.pbn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_hash=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$PBOOT_GEN_ELF&nbsp; $elf_file $output_hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
命令 ./AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/image_header&nbsp; 用法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
image_header flash_type header_type input_code_file output_header_file secure_type [dbl_preamble_file or elf_src_file]</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
flash_type&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; -&nbsp; flash 类型：nand 或者 nor</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
header_type&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; -&nbsp; 头类型可以为： dbl, dbl_preamble, osbl, appsbl, apps, amsshash, hostdl, ehostdl, dsp1hash, dsp2hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
input_code_file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 用于生成文件头的输入文件</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_header_file - 生成的文件头</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
secure_type&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; -&nbsp; 'secure' or 'nonsecure'</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dbl_preamble_file&nbsp; - 当 header_type 等于 'dbl_preamble' 的时候指向 dbl preamble 文件的路径</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_src_file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 当 header_type 等于 'hash' 的时候指向 elf file corresponding to hash table 的路径</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
例如：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
=============</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
IMAGE_HEADER=./AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/image_header</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
flash_type=nand</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
header_type=amsshash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
input_code_file=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_header_file=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.hash.hd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
secure_type=nonsecure</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dbl_preamble_file=</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_src_file=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.pbn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$IMAGE_HEADER&nbsp; $flash_type $header_type $input_code_file $output_header_file $secure_type $elf_src_file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
命令 AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/pboot_add_hash 用法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
把 hash 头和 hash 表插入到 ELF文件作为起始段 ，在物理内存中它实际在最后。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
pboot_add_hash [-d] elf_file hash_table output_elf</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
-d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - debug 模式</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - the ELF file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
hash_table&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - hash table (signed or not)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_elf&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - final output</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
PBOOT_ADD_HASH=./AMSS/products/7x30/tools/headergen/pboot_add_hash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
elf_file=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.pbn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
hash_table=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.hash_nonsec.mbn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
output_elf=./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/amsslibs/build/arm11/CORELIBS_AABBQMAZM.mbn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$PBOOT_ADD_HASH&nbsp; $elf_file&nbsp; $hash_table&nbsp; $output_elf</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.3.3.5.1.1.2.2env.BinBuilder 过程解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.3.3.5.1.1.2.3 env.MbnBuilder 过程解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mbn 类型的文件是我们最终烧写到板子上的镜像文件</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
在文件： ./AMSS/products/7x30/core/bsp/build/scripts/mbn_builder.py 中有 mbn 文件的编译规则，要注意的是，不同的 modem 源代码版本，它里面的规则有可能不一样。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1220 以及之前的版本，编译规则中有：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
def mbn_generate(env):</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; #-------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; # MBN builder definition</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; #-------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; mbn_act = env.GetBuilderAction(mbn_builder)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; mbn_bld = env.Builder(action = mbn_act,</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; emitter = mbn_emitter,</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; suffix = '.mbn')</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; env.Append(BUILDERS = {'MbnBuilder' : mbn_bld})</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; mbn_dummy_act = env.GetBuilderAction(mbn_dummy_file_gen)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; mbn_dummy_bld = env.Builder(action = mbn_dummy_act, suffix = '.mbn')</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; env.Append(BUILDERS = {'MbnDummyBuilder' : mbn_dummy_bld})</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1240 后的版本为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
def mbn_generate(env):</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; env.AddMethod(mbn_builder, "MbnBuilder")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; #-------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; # MBN builder definition</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; #-------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; stage1_mbn_act = env.GetBuilderAction(stage1_mbn_builder)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; stage1_mbn_bld = env.Builder(action = stage1_mbn_act,</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; emitter = stage1_mbn_emitter,</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

./AMSS/products/7x30/core/storage/tools/jsdcc/partition_load_pt/Makefile</p>

};</p>

&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1.4.4.1　osbl 装载 appsbl 过程分析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
osbl 通过 osbl_load_appsbl 函数装载应用程序的 boot loader 到指定的 RAM 中</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
osbl_load_appsbl 在文件：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./AMSS/products/7x30/core/boot/secboot2/osbl/shared/src/osbl_aarm_boot.c:119 中</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
void osbl_load_appsbl( bl_shared_data_type *bl_shared_data )</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
...</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/*从 flash 中装载 appsbl 头和镜像到 RAM 中*/</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; osbl_load_header_and_image_with_cookie( APPSBL_IMG, &amp;appsbl_image_header_with_cookie );</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
...&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/*如果 boot loader 没有装载到地址 0x0, 那么将会拷贝 appsbl 向量表到地址 0x0, appsbl 镜像的向量表总是在在镜像的头 64字节中*/</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; if ( apps_image_start_addr != 0x0 )</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/* 为 L4 with kernel entry 初始化复位向量，其他的向量赋值为 无限循环*/</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
复位向量的初始化值与 appsbl 镜像起始地址有关，复位的时候此值会被放入到 PC 寄存器</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
向量 0x00000020 中保存 appsbl 镜像的起始地址</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
向量 0x00000000 中的值为 0xE59FF018</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; address 0x00000000:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ldr pc, [pc, #0x18]</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
address 0x00000020:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; apps_image_start_addr */ &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; uint32 *vector_ptr = (uint32*) 0x00000020;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *vector_ptr = apps_image_start_addr;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for ( --vector_ptr; vector_ptr; vector_ptr-- )</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *vector_ptr = 0xEAFFFFFE;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /* Infinite loop */</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *vector_ptr&nbsp; = 0xE59FF018;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /* ldr pc, [pc, #0x18] */</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
} /* osbl_load_appsbl() */</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
osbl_load_header_and_image_with_cookie 函数完成 appsbl 镜像头和镜像的装载，它首先会尝试从 mibi 中装载 appsbl 镜像头，如果当前是 nor non-partition table 设备，那么装载将会成功，如果不成功，那么认为 appsbl 头位于它分区的起始位置，将其读出。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
