&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; device_desc.idVendor&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; = htole16(dev_info-&gt;vendor);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; device_desc.idProduct&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; = htole16(dev_info-&gt;product);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3　手机端fastboot 命令分析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("boot", cmd_boot);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("erase:", cmd_erase);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("flash:", cmd_flash);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("continue", cmd_continue);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("reboot", cmd_reboot);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("reboot-bootloader", cmd_reboot_bootloader);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("getvar:", cmd_getvar);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_register("download:", cmd_download);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.1　boot</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.2　erase</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.3　flash</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.4　continue</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.5　reboot</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.6　reboot-bootloader</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.7　getvar</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
bootable/bootloader/lk/app/aboot/aboot.c</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_publish("product", "swordfish");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_publish("kernel", "lk");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot_publish("version", "0.5");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
调用</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sudo fastboot&nbsp; getvar product</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sudo fastboot&nbsp; getvar kernel</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sudo fastboot&nbsp; getvar lk</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
只有 fastboot_publish 某变量以后，才能用 sudo fastboot&nbsp; getvar 获取某变量的值</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.8　download</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dd&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.9　update</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.9.1　system/core/fastboot/fastboot.c:294:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.3.9.2　fprintf(stderr, "archive does not contain '%s'\n", name);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.2.4　fastboot 模式流程分析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3 recovery 模式</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.1　recovery 模式概述</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Recovery 模式是 android 手机进行系统恢复/升级的一种方式，在设置模块中通过菜单 ”恢复出厂设置”把系统能恢复到出厂默认状态（会清空用户保存在手机上的电话本，短信,电子邮件，应用程序数据等信息）；通过按键进入该模式可以把 sdcard 上的系统升级包写入到手机中实现系统软件更新。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
进入 recovery 模式需要一定条件，通常以下几种方式可以进入：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1. 关机状态下通过按键进入（如：同时按 HOME + 电源 进入 recovery 模式）</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2. 恢复出厂设置进入 recovery 模式</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
3. 系统升级进入 recovery 模式</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4. 开机状态下通过重启进入</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
进入 recovery 分区的前提是：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
手机必须存在 recovery 分区，并且烧写了 recovery.img 镜像文件。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
recovery.img 镜像文件主要包括两部分：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1. 标准的内核镜像 out/target/product/msm7630_surf/kernel</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2. 一个小的文件系统 out/target/product/msm7630_surf/ramdisk-recovery.img，这个小系统提供了一套字符 ui 程序，用于与用户的交互。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
相对于正常启动的 ramdisk.img ，ramdisk-recovery.img 主要有如下区别：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1. init.rc 的内容进行了简化，原始文件为：bootable/recovery/etc/init.rc</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2. sbin 目录下多了可执行程序 /sbin/recovery&nbsp; 源代码为： bootable/recovery</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
3. 根目录下多了 res 资源文件夹， 原始文件为 bootable/recovery/res</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4. 资源文件夹下有 res/keys 文件，用于软件安装时候的文件验证</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
5. 根目录下文件 default.prop 的内容分别来自：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
out/target/product/msm7630_surf/root/default.prop out/target/product/msm7630_surf/system/build.prop</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
系统升级可以通过多种方式进行：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1. 手机开机状态下，通过手机自带的升级程序连接指定的网站下载特定的经过认证的软件包进行升级，此种升级方式通常是官方自带的，软件包也是官方（手机软件提供商）提供。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2. 通过按键进入 手机的 recovery 模式，把待升级的软件包放在手机SD卡的根目录，然后选择 recovery的相应菜单进行升级。此中升级方式在 android 的破解版中很流行，目前安卓网等论坛提供的 android 手机刷机方法都推荐这种方法。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
不管是主动还是被动进入 recovery 模式，其目的都是为了给手机软件升级或者恢复系统的默认设置，如果是升级系统，那么我们就得制作升级包。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.2　软件升级包</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
能够被Recovery程序识别并处理的软件升级包通常包括一些特有的规则：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1）必须是标准的zip压缩包；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2）recovery脚本必须存入在META-INF\com\google\android\update-script；</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
3）其它的一些证书和签名信息应该都放在\META-INF\下。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
升级一般通过运行升级包中的META-INF/com/google/android/update-script脚本来执行自定义升级，脚本中是一组recovery 系统能识别的控制命令，文件系统操作命令，例如write_raw_image（写FLASH分区），copy_dir（复制目录）。该包一般被下载至SDCARD</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
不同版本的 recovery 程序，它的 update-script 命令格式是不一样的，例如：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Cupcake 的recovery 程序支持 copy_dir 命令，1.6以后的版本已经取消。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.3　recovery v1跟recovery v2的区别</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
recovery v2是从donut开始出现的， 相对于recovery v1做了不少的改动，增强了原有的功能的同时，尽量将可能变化的部分隔离出来，让各厂商可以添加自己的特性，这些体现在UI，设备功能上。 下面是从v1到v2改动的地方：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1、ui部分独立出来放到default_recovery_ui.c</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
界面上的修改一般改这里就可以了。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2、脚本解析器从amend切换到edify</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
edify支持简单的逻辑语法，脚本语法也不兼容了，不要迷恋recovery/etc/META-INF/com/google/android/update-script，这个脚本已经</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
不适合recovery v2。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4　软件升级脚本语法解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
eclair 版本的 recovery 程序支持以下脚本控制命令：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./bootable/recovery/updater/install.c&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("mount", MountFn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("is_mounted", IsMountedFn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("unmount", UnmountFn);</p>

RegisterFunction("greater_than_int", GreaterThanIntFn);</p>

RegisterFunction(const char* name, Function fn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.1　mount</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount 命令解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
高通 7630 分区信息：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$ cat /proc/mtd</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dev:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; size&nbsp;&nbsp; erasesize&nbsp; name</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd0: 00500000 00040000 "boot"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd1: 06900000 00040000 "system"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd2: 00500000 00040000 "cache"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd3: 13480000 00040000 "userdata"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd4: 00300000 00040000 "persist"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd5: 00500000 00040000 "recovery"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
语法为：Mount(type, location, mount_point)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果 type 为 "MTD", 那么 location 可以为设备分区名称,默认该分区以 "yaffs" 的方式挂载，如挂载 system 分区：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount("MTD", "system", "/system")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果 type 不为 "MTD" ，那么必须写明具体的文件系统类型， location 必须填设备名称，例如是sdcard ，那么 type 为 "vfat"&nbsp; 设备名称 /dev/block/mmcblk0 ：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount("vfat","/dev/block/mmcblk0","sdcard")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
system 分区挂载过程：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount("MTD", "system", "/system")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mkdir("system", 0755);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd = mtd_find_partition_by_name("system");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd_mount_partition(mtd, "/system", "yaffs2", 0 /* rw */)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
const unsigned long flags = MS_NOATIME | MS_NODEV | MS_NODIRATIME;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sprintf(devname, "/dev/block/mtdblock%d", mtd-&gt;device_index);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount(/dev/block/mtdblock, "/system", "yaffs2" , flags, NULL);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果 mtd_mount_partition 第四个参数不为 0,那么以只读方式挂载：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount(devname, mount_point, filesystem, flags | MS_RDONLY, 0)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
平时无法写系统分区，是因为 init 在读取 init.rc 后，默认挂载system 为只读</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
系统更新可以写system分区，是因为这里把该分区挂载成了可读写</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sdcard 挂载过程：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount("vfat","/dev/block/mmcblk0","sdcard")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mkdir("system", 0755);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mount("/dev/block/mmcblk0", "/sdcard", "vfat",MS_NOATIME | MS_NODEV | MS_NODIRATIME, "")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.2　getprop</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
从系统环境中获取属性值</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.3　file_getprop</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
语法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
从属性文件中获取属性值，可以为android系统中的任意属性配置文件</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
例如：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
getprop ro.bootloader</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.4　assert</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
语法：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
此命令相当于程序中的断言</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("assert", AssertFn); 它执行的是 AssertFn 函数</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
assert() 函数用法</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
assert宏的原型定义在&lt;assert.h&gt;中，其作用是如果它的条件返回错误，则终止程序执行。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.5　format</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
格式化分区</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
format BOOT:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
format SYSTEM:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.6　apply_patch_check</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.7　apply_patch_space</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.4.1.8　apply_patch</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
apply_patch_check&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
apply_patch_space</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
apply_patch</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
以上命令在手机端都是执行函数 ApplyPatchFn</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
./bootable/recovery/updater/install.c</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("apply_patch", ApplyPatchFn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("apply_patch_check", ApplyPatchFn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RegisterFunction("apply_patch_space", ApplyPatchFn);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
语法：</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd3: 05a00000 00020000 "system"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd4: 01e00000 00020000 "cache"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mtd5: 059c0000 00020000 "userdata"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
recovery_init() 调用的是文件 bootable/bootloader/lk/app/aboot/recovery.c中的函数：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/* Read and write the bootloader command from the "misc" partition.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;* These return zero on success.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;*/</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
从 misc 分区读取</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
misc&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 0.25MB：是存放开机画面的分区,开机时那个白色的大G1字样(默认为白色"T-mobile G1")</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
recovery&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5MB：是G1的恢复模式镜像区(即开机按Home+End进入的界面)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Boot&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.5MB：Linux操作系统内核和ramdisk镜像一起打包后存放的分区</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
system&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 90MB：是system.img存放的分区，启动后此镜像挂载在根目录下的system文件夹中。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
cache&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 30MB：是缓存临时文件夹，挂载为/cache目录，据说是除了T-mobile的OTA更新外，别无用处。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
userdata&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 89.75MB：用户安装的软件以及各种数据，挂载为/data目录</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
msm_nand&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;256MB：代表整个Nand Flash，不是一个分区。但是所有的分区加起来才217.5MB，小于256MB，说明还有剩余的flash空间。（此分区在大部分机上不存在，不影响使用）</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
恢复模式的 init.rc 文件很简单，只启动了 recovery 和 adbd 服务</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
on init</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; export PATH /sbin</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; export ANDROID_ROOT /system</p>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; export EXTERNAL_STORAGE /sdcard</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; symlink /system/etc /etc</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mkdir /sdcard</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mkdir /system</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mkdir /data</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mkdir /cache</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mount /tmp /tmp tmpfs</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
on boot</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ifup lo</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; domainname localdomain</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
service recovery /sbin/recovery</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
on property:persist.service.adb.enable=0</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return INSTALL_CORRUPT;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
int numKeys;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
# #define PUBLIC_KEYS_FILE "/res/keys"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /* Try to open the package.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; */</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ZipArchive zip;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; err = mzOpenZipArchive(path, &amp;zip);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (err != 0) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; LOGE("Can't open %s\n(%s)\n", path, err != -1 ? strerror(err) : "bad");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return INSTALL_CORRUPT;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;/* Verify and install the contents of the package.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; */</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; int status = handle_update_package(path, &amp;zip);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mzCloseZipArchive(&amp;zip);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return status;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>

log文件/cache/recovery/log</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.5.2　系统更新流程</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
在设置模块 -&gt; 关于手机 里面预设了 “系统更新” 的菜单项配置， 如果安装的软件包里面有过滤器为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&lt;intent-filter&gt;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&lt;action android:name="android.settings.SYSTEM_UPDATE_SETTINGS" /&gt;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /&gt;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&lt;/intent-filter&gt;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
的软件包，那么才会显示 ”系统更新” 的菜单项，否则没有该项菜单。此类菜单的处理方式通过文件：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
packages/apps/Settings/src/com/android/settings/Utils.java 中的函数</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
updatePreferenceToSpecificActivityOrRemove 来实现。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Android 源代码中为系统升级包预留了位置&nbsp; packages/apps/Updater/ 但是没有具体的源代码，这个源代码可以由厂商自己开发，这样做是为了方便厂商灵活的定制系统升级方式。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
在 HTC 手机中该软件包通常为： SystemUpdater.apk 我们可以从他们的手机中提取。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
流程应该为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
应用模块中调用：service.systemUpdate() 实际调用的是文件：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
frameworks/base/services/java/com/android/server/FallbackCheckinService.java</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
中的函数：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
public void systemUpdate()</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; RecoverySystem.rebootAndUpdate();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
frameworks/base/services/java/com/android/server/SystemUpdateReceiver.java</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
public class SystemUpdateReceiver extends BroadcastReceiver {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; private static final String TAG = "MasterClear";</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; @Override</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ICheckinService service =</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ICheckinService.Stub.asInterface(</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ServiceManager.getService("checkin"));</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ...</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; service.systemUpdate();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ...</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
frameworks/base/core/java/android/os/ICheckinService.aidl</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
中加函数函数声明：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
void systemUpdate();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
rebootAndUpdate 函数应该为：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
frameworks/base/core/java/com/android/internal/os/RecoverySystem.java</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public static void rebootAndUpdate(File update) throws IOException {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String path = update.getCanonicalPath();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (path.startsWith("/cache/")) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; path = "CACHE:" + path.substring(7);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else if (path.startsWith("/data/")) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; path = "DATA:" + path.substring(6);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; throw new IllegalArgumentException(</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; "Must start with /cache or /data: " + path);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bootCommand("--update_package=" + path);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
getCanonicalPath() 获取文件的绝对路径</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
getAbsolutePath()和getCanonicalPath()的不同</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
public static void test2() throws Exception{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;File file = new File("../update.zip");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(file.getAbsolutePath());</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(file.getCanonicalPath());</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
得到的结果</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/data/bin/../update.zip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
/data/update.zip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
bootCommand("--update_package=" + path) 会写命令：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
--update_package= CACHE:/cache/xxxx&nbsp; 或者 --update_package= DATA:/data/xxxx 到命令文件：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
<strong>/cache/recovery/command</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
重启以后，会检查命令文件&nbsp;<strong>/cache/recovery/command</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; // --- if that doesn't work, try the command file</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (*argc &lt;= 1) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FILE *fp = fopen_root_path(COMMAND_FILE, "r");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (fp != NULL) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; char *argv0 = (*argv)[0];</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *argv = (char **) malloc(sizeof(char *) * MAX_ARGS);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (*argv)[0] = argv0;&nbsp; // use the same program name</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; char buf[MAX_ARG_LENGTH];</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for (*argc = 1; *argc &lt; MAX_ARGS; ++*argc) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (!fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), fp)) break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (*argv)[*argc] = strdup(strtok(buf, "\r\n"));&nbsp; // Strip newline.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; check_and_fclose(fp, COMMAND_FILE);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; LOGI("Got arguments from %s\n", COMMAND_FILE);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
static const struct option OPTIONS[] = {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; { "send_intent", required_argument, NULL, 's' },</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; { "update_package", required_argument, NULL, 'u' },</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; { "wipe_data", no_argument, NULL, 'w' },</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; { "wipe_cache", no_argument, NULL, 'c' },</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp; { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
};</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
while ((arg = getopt_long(argc, argv, "", OPTIONS, NULL)) != -1) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; switch (arg) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case 'p': previous_runs = atoi(optarg); break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case 's': send_intent = optarg; break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case 'u': update_package = optarg; break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case 'w': wipe_data = wipe_cache = 1; break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case 'c': wipe_cache = 1; break;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case '?':</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; LOGE("Invalid command argument\n");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; continue;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
因为 &nbsp;<strong>/cache/recovery/command 内容为&nbsp;</strong>--update_package= CACHE:/cache/xxxx 所以 update_package 不为空，</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果不为空，那么将会执行命令 install_package 对包进行安装</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
if (update_package != NULL) {&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
status = install_package(update_package);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
升级包具体做什么内容，完全由脚本： META-INF/com/google/android/update-script 和 包的内容所决定。具体内容参考章节 软件升级包以及软件升级脚本语法解析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.5.3　通过sd卡实现刷机</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
首先通过特定按键进入 recovery 模式，符合规定的软件升级包命名为 update.zip 放在sd卡根目录，</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
具体升级过程由升级包中的脚本决定，过程跟系统升级类似</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
static const char *SDCARD_PACKAGE_FILE = "SDCARD:update.zip";</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
int status = install_package(SDCARD_PACKAGE_FILE);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
fastboot 模式下烧写 recovery 分区</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
<strong>手动打包 ramdisk-recovery.img</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
out/host/linux-x86/bin/mkbootfs out/target/product/msm7630_surf/recovery/root | out/host/linux-x86/bin/minigzip &gt; out/target/product/msm7630_surf/ramdisk-recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
MKBOOTFS=out/host/linux-x86/bin/mkbootfs</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
ROOT_DIR=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/recovery/root</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
MINIGZIP=out/host/linux-x86/bin/minigzip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
OUTPUT=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/ramdisk-recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
<strong>$MKBOOTFS&nbsp; $ROOT_DIR | $MINIGZIP &gt; $OUTPUT</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
<strong>手动生成 recovery.img</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
out/host/linux-x86/bin/mkbootimg&nbsp; --kernel out/target/product/msm7630_surf/kernel&nbsp; --ramdisk out/target/product/msm7630_surf/ramdisk-recovery.img --pagesize 4096 --cmdline "console=ttyDCC0 androidboot.hardware=qcom" --base 0x00200000 --output out/target/product/msm7630_surf/recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
MKBOOTIMG=out/host/linux-x86/bin/mkbootimg</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
KERNEL=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/kernel</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
RAMDISK=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/ramdisk-recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
PAGESIZE=4096</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
CMDLINE="console=ttyDCC0 androidboot.hardware=qcom"</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
BASE=0x00200000</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
OUTPUT=out/target/product/$TARGET_PRODUCT/recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
$MKBOOTIMG --kernel $KERNEL --ramdisk $RAMDISK --pagesize $PAGESIZE --cmdline "$C<strong>MDLINE" --base $BASE --output $OUTPUT</strong></p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sudo fastboot-eclair2.2 flash recovery out/target/product/msm7630_surf/recovery.img</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
4.1.3.6　系统升级包案例分析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
可以改善G网通话质量的update.zip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

4.1.4.1　HBOOT降级方法</p>

http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=726258</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
exec ("perl Program_Factory_Image.pl $com_port $timeout $factory_file");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
