<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Android的计量单位px,in,mm,pt,dp,dip,sp</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
http://blog.csdn.net/hustpzb/archive/2010/11/20/6023145.aspx</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Historically, programmers always designed computer interfaces in terms of pixels. For example, you mightmake a field 300 pixels wide, allow 5 pixels of spacing between columns, and define icons 16-by-16 pixels in size. The problem is that if you run that program
 on new displays with more and more dots per inch (dpi), the user interface appears smaller and smaller. At some point, it becomes too hard to read. Resolution-independent measurements help solve this problem.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Android supports all the following units:</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• px (pixels): Dots on the screen.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• in (inches): Size as measured by a ruler.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• mm (millimeters): Size as measured by a ruler.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• pt (points): 1/72 of an inch.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• dp (density-independent pixels): An abstract unit based on the density of the screen. On a display with 160 dots per inch, 1dp = 1px.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• dip: Synonym for dp, used more often in Google examples.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
• sp (scale-independent pixels): Similar to dp but also scaled by the user’s font size preference.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
To make your interface scalable to any current and future type of display, I recommend you always use the sp unit for text sizes and the dip unit for everything else. You should also consider using vector graphics instead of bitmaps</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果英文不想看，看下面：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
px：是屏幕的像素点</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
in：英寸</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
mm：毫米</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
pt：磅，1/72 英寸</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dp：一个基于density的抽象单位，如果一个160dpi的屏幕，1dp=1px</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
dip：等同于dp</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
sp：同dp相似，但还会根据用户的字体大小偏好来缩放。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
建议使用sp作为文本的单位，其它用dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
针对dip和px 的关系，做以下概述：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
HVGA屏density=160；QVGA屏density=120；WVGA屏density=240；WQVGA屏density=120</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
density值表示每英寸有多少个显示点，与分辨率是两个概念。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
不同density下屏幕分辨率信息，以480dip*800dip的 WVGA(density=240)为例</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
density=120时 屏幕实际分辨率为240px*400px （两个点对应一个分辨率）</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
状态栏和标题栏高各19px或者25dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
横屏是屏幕宽度400px 或者800dip,工作区域高度211px或者480dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
竖屏时屏幕宽度240px或者480dip,工作区域高度381px或者775dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
density=160时 屏幕实际分辨率为320px*533px （3个点对应两个分辨率）</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
状态栏和标题栏高个25px或者25dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
横屏是屏幕宽度533px 或者800dip,工作区域高度295px或者480dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
竖屏时屏幕宽度320px或者480dip,工作区域高度508px或者775dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
density=240时 屏幕实际分辨率为480px*800px （一个点对于一个分辨率）</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
状态栏和标题栏高个38px或者25dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
横屏是屏幕宽度800px 或者800dip,工作区域高度442px或者480dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
竖屏时屏幕宽度480px或者480dip,工作区域高度762px或者775dip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
apk的资源包中，当屏幕density=240时使用hdpi 标签的资源</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
当屏幕density=160时，使用mdpi标签的资源</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
当屏幕density=120时，使用ldpi标签的资源。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
不加任何标签的资源是各种分辨率情况下共用的。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
布局时尽量使用单位dip，少使用px</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
8.2 Android 开机充电</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Android 开机画面可以分为内核和文件系统两部分</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
8.3 Android 开机动画</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Android 开机画面可以分为内核和文件系统两部分</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
1. 内核部分</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
内核部分的开机画面，默认为一个小企鹅图标，通常在屏幕的左上角</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2.文件系统默认部分</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2.1 开机显示的 ANDROID 文字</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
2.2 ANDROID 发光动画</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
我们可以分别对以上部分进行处理，定制自己的开机动画</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
替换 ANDROID 文件，只需在android文件系统根目录下存在 initlogo.rle</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
替换 ANDROID 发光动画，只需存在文件 /data/local/bootanimation.zip 或者 /system/media/bootanimation.zip 出厂设置的默认文件通常为 /system/media/bootanimation.zip</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
命令：adb shell ls /system/media/ 可以看到 htc 等手机都存在 bootanimation.zip 文件</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
下面通过流程分析内核和android是怎样处理开机画面的</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
8.3.1 内核开机画面</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
8.3.2 文件系统开机画面</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
static void fbcon_init(struct vc_data *vc, int init)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; fbcon_prepare_logo(vc, info, cols, rows, new_cols, new_rows);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; logo_height = fb_prepare_logo(info, ops-&gt;rotate);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; fb_logo.logo = fb_find_logo(depth);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
const struct linux_logo * __init_refok fb_find_logo(int depth)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; const struct linux_logo *logo = NULL;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (nologo)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return NULL;</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

./frameworks/base/cmds/bootanimation/bootanimation_main.cpp</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
int main(int argc, char** argv)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 。。。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; char value[PROPERTY_VALUE_MAX];</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;property_get("debug.sf.nobootanimation", value, "0");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; int noBootAnimation = atoi(value);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; LOGI_IF(noBootAnimation,&nbsp; "boot animation disabled");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (!noBootAnimation) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sp&lt;ProcessState&gt; proc(ProcessState::self());</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ProcessState::self()-&gt;startThreadPool();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sp&lt;BootAnimation&gt; boot = new BootAnimation();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IPCThreadState::self()-&gt;joinThreadPool();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return 0;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
property_get("debug.sf.nobootanimation", value, "0");如果属性 debug.sf.nobootanimation 等于 1 ，表明没有开机动画，否则调用 new BootAnimation() 显示动画。</p>

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sp&lt;SurfaceControl&gt; control = session()-&gt;createSurface(</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; getpid(), 0, dinfo.w, dinfo.h, PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB_565);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; session()-&gt;openTransaction();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; control-&gt;setLayer(0x40000000);</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; session()-&gt;closeTransaction();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
。。。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mAndroidAnimation = false;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (err != NO_ERROR) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; err = mZip.open("/system/media/bootanimation.zip");</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (err != NO_ERROR) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mAndroidAnimation = true;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return NO_ERROR;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>

bool BootAnimation::threadLoop()</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
{</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; bool r;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (mAndroidAnimation) {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else {</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; r = movie();</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 。。。</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return r;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
readyToRun 中首先会确定是否有文件 "/data/local/bootanimation.zip" ；如果没有，那么再确定是否有文件 "/system/media/bootanimation.zip" 如果都不存在，那么设置变量 mAndroidAnimation = true</p>

8.3.2.4　bootanimation.zip 文件分析</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Bootanimation/{part1,part2,desc.txt}</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
Bootanimation/desc.txt 内容：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
512 256 30</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
p 1 0 part0</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
p 0 0 part1</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
各字段的解释：</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'512' 动画画面的宽度</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'256' 动画画面的高度</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'30' 播放的帧频,每秒30帧</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'p' 定义动画一部分的开始</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'1' 定义的动画循环播放次数</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'0' 定义一个暂停 (max 10)</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'part0' 包含动画图片的文件夹名称</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'p' 定义动画另一部分的开始</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'0' 定义动画无限循环</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
'0' 定义一个暂停</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">

<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
10.1 嵌入式Linux通过帧缓存截图 - Framebuffer Screenshot in Embedded Linux</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
10.2 Linux下右键烧录文件</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;解压放到~/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts/下面</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
用法：右键点击需要烧写的文件-&gt;Scripts-&gt;Fastboot-&gt;分区</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
压缩包内自带fastboot命令：._fastboot（设置为隐藏使其在右键菜单中不显示）</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
如果你的机器上需要sudo命令才能进行烧写的话，请打开压缩包中的文件._flash.sh，在每个`dirname $0`前面加上sudo</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px; text-align:left">
10.3 Linux下右键svn</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
解压到~/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts下就OK了</p>
<p align="left" style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:0px; font-family:Arial; font-size:14px; line-height:26px">
